tags: Doctor friendliness,Value for money,
review: It was a very good experience as I had met Dr.Tanvi for the first time in Dr.Jha's clinic as she consulted me by scrutinizing my teeth and advising me for the best price she could but still I have not completed my treatment but I hope she will complete the treatment of my fixed partial Denture( FPD) very successfully to the best of my knowledge so I can prove it to others that she has really done a wonderful job as par my satisfaction,I hope that she will work very hard as she has been chosen as the presidency  position and will help the poor and the people who are really in need and prove that she is really fit for the position she has been alloted,I wish her great success  in the future and hope she proves to extend her position in the years to come,God bless her always.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I had an amazing experience with Dr Tanvi Jha , she went out of her routine to give me an early morning Appointment,she was on time too.She explained  the treatment , she is one of the best dentist who's ever worked on my teeth , I have felt great ! Great office. Super hi-tech and innovative approach to dentistry. Sterile. Brand new office space and equipment.  Staff is great. I am a Huge fan of Dr Tanvi Jha. Stay blessed
Regards
Manvinder kaur Premi.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I had visited  Dr Tanvi  mam for my root canal treatment,  it was very painful, but thanks to Dr Tanvi, who not only helped me  got rid with my pain but she also treated very well..She ha got the beautiful  set up abd the ambiance  is great...Highly recommended

review: Dr Tanvi Jha is most professional Dentist I have ever visited , she is very humble, caring and knowledgeable Dr and very well explains the problem, process and exact treatment and dos and don'ts clearly. She is very good and has a good set up in her clinic . I highly recommend Dr Tanvi Jha for all dental problems if your facing must visit.
